CustomField.description: This formula field is for added for report, displays QTR for give product date.
CustomField.formula: 'Q' & IF( ISNULL(ServiceDate), IF(MONTH( Opportunity.CloseDate) <= 3 ,'1', IF(MONTH( Opportunity.CloseDate) <=6,'2', if(MONTH( Opportunity.CloseDate) <=9 ,'3', IF(MONTH( Opportunity.CloseDate) <=12,'4','')))) & ' - ' & TEXT(YEAR(Opportunity.CloseDate)) , IF(MONTH( ServiceDate) <= 3 ,'1', IF(MONTH( ServiceDate) <=6,'2', if(MONTH( ServiceDate) <=9 ,'3', IF(MONTH( ServiceDate) <=12,'4','')))) & ' - ' & TEXT(YEAR(ServiceDate)) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Product Date QTR, if product date is not specified the close date is considered.
CustomField.label: Product Date Qtr
